item.title: Remakes That Played Things Too Safe But You Should Still Play
item.description:
Final Fantasy 7 Remake was one of the boldest remakes of all time when it was released in 2020. The name is a bit misleading, as it’s more of a sequel than a remake of the original PS1 version of Final Fantasy 7 , but saying anything more would be a spoiler.

The 2019 version of Call of Duty: Modern Warfare is also a good example of a bold remake. As great as it is when developers take big risks when remaking a classic game, others err on the side of caution to appease more of their longtime fans. These next games are among the best remakes that don’t necessarily add or try many new things, but they are still fun games.

The Legend Of Zelda: Link's Awakening (2019)

Toys To Life

The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening
7.8 /10
Released
September 20, 2019

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
E For Everyone due to Mild Fantasy, Violence
Powered by

The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening was originally released for the Game Boy in 1993. Besides a color enhancement, the 2019 version was the first major remake of the game, and it changed up the art style to give everything a toy-like aesthetic.

It’s a great visual style, but beyond the graphical upgrade, it’s still the exact same world and gameplay. A classic top-down Zelda will never get old, so it’s understandable why things weren’t touched up too much for this remake.

Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater

What A Thrill

Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater
9.0 /10
Released
August 28, 2025

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
Mature 17+ // Blood, Sexual Themes, Violence
Powered by

Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater was originally released for the PS2 in 2004 and had many versions follow it, including a 3D version on the 3DS. Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater is a full graphical remake that adds some quality of life changes to make gameplay feel more modern, from sneaking around the jungle to shooting enemies.

However, most of the audio is reused in cutscenes and Codec calls, so the story doesn't change at all. The core plot follows the same beats, just with more stunning visuals, and that’s not a bad thing even if the original director, Hideo Kojima, wasn’t involved. It was a great game in 2004, and it remains so now.

Final Fantasy 4 (DS Remake)

Now With More Voices

Final Fantasy 4 (3D Remake)
9.0 /10
Released
July 22, 2008

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
E10+ For Everyone 10+ Due To Alcohol Reference, Fantasy Violence, Mild Language, Suggestive Themes
Powered by

Most Final Fantasy remake games play it close to the source material, like the DS remake of Final Fantasy 4 . That faithfulness is not a bad thing, as it's great to see all the pixel models in full, albeit cuter, 3D graphics. Also, voice acting was added to make the story feel more dramatic.

The turn-based battles and narrative beats are almost one-to-one translations, but they're perhaps a bit easier than the SNES version, which was released in 1991 as opposed to this 2008 remake.

Resident Evil 4

Can’t Remake Perfection

Resident Evil 4
9 /10
70
9.6 /10
Released
March 24, 2023

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature 17+ due to Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Strong Language
Powered by

Capcom made the wise decision to remake the second and third RE games before Resident Evil 4 . As PS1 games, they needed more work to make them feel modern, whereas Resident Evil 4 , thanks to countless remasters, already felt modern.

Gunplay and controls are perhaps more solid in the 2023 version as opposed to the 2005 original, but most of the game doesn't take any chances to surprise players. The biggest difference is some slight extra exploration on the boat, but other than that, Capcom knew it didn’t have to try hard to redo perfection.

Super Mario RPG

Turn-Based Platforming

Super Mario RPG
8.7 /10
Released
November 17, 2023

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
E For Everyone Due To Mild Fantasy Violence
Powered by

Super Mario RPG: Legend of the Seven Stars was Mario's first RPG spinoff, which was released for the SNES in 1996. In 2023, it received a Switch remake simply called Super Mario RPG .

There are a few additions, like team attacks and new difficulty settings, but otherwise, it's the exact same journey as it was back in '96. Guides that worked back then probably work in the remake, too, but despite the lack of twists, fans were happy to get their hands on it again.

Shadow Of The Colossus

A Haunting Boss Rush

Shadow of the Colossus (2018)
8.9 /10
Released
February 6, 2018

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
T For Teen due to Blood, Violence
Powered by

Shadow of the Colossus was a late-gen PS2 game in 2005 that redefined the action-adventure genre. Instead of exploring an open world to fight hundreds of enemies, players just had to take on sixteen giants called Colossi that roamed the earth.

The game got a decent remaster in 2011, and then the 2018 remake was like the cherry on top. Fans were hopeful that the remake would add lost Colossi to the campaign, or answer some of the original's lingering secrets. It didn’t, but the core experience wasn’t diminished either, and at the end of the day, that's what matters most.

Persona 3 Reload

Become A Member Of S.E.E.S.

Persona 3 Reload
9 /10
13
9.2 /10
Released
February 2, 2024

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
Mature 17 / Blood, Partial Nudity, Sexual Themes, Strong Language, Violence
Powered by

Persona 3 was the first game in the series to introduce the concept of Social Links. Released first in Japan, this turn-based PS2 game made its North American debut in 2007. These school-life side quests allow players to get to know their party members better, along with side characters that can help in their own way.

Besides a litany of quality-of-life changes and additions to make the narrative flow better, Persona 3 Reload is remade to fit a new gaming generation in 2024, and it is successful in that respect. The one change fans were a bit displeased with is that the Aegis campaign released later as paid DLC.

Demon’s Souls

A Stellar Launch Game For The PS5

Demon's Souls
10 /10
8.5 /10
Released
November 12, 2020

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Violence
Powered by

Demon’s Souls earned itself a small cult following after its PS3 release in 2009. The tough gameplay difficulty and mysterious dark fantasy world drew players in, and the game eventually blossomed into the wildly popular Soulslike genre. Demon's Souls returned in 2020 with a full remake from Bluepoint Games, the same developer who remade Shadow of the Colossus , and for better or worse, the game was still nearly impossible to beat thanks to its challenge level.

Bluepoint Games is the best in the remake biz, even though they generally don’t add much to the experiences they're working on besides visual touch-ups. Now, if only Sony would let Bluepoint Games remake Bloodborne .

item.title: EA Takes Down Popular Call of Duty Map From Battlefield 6 Portal
item.description:
A player recently remade Call of Duty ’s “Shipment” map using Battlefield 6 ’s Portal mode, but the creation was quickly removed for breaking the Community Guidelines. This showcases how eager Electronic Arts is to crack down on gamers creating “inappropriate” content for Battlefield 6 .

Battlefield 6 was released on October 10, offering a variety of game modes for fans. Apart from having a single-player campaign and regular multiplayer modes, the popular FPS offers players the opportunity to customize their own games via Battlefield 6 ’s Portal mode. In this mode, anyone can create their own maps, weapons, and even rules, and compete with friends.

Electronic Arts Removes Popular 'Shipment 2019 Edition' Map From Battlefield 6 Portal

Unfortunately, one of the most popular maps from Portal mode has recently been taken down by EA. The “Shipment 2019 edition” map was removed from Battlefield 6 due to breaking the rules, which forbid players from making “inappropriate references to third-party products.” First introduced in Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare and reappearing in several entries of the franchise later, “Shipment” is a popular Call of Duty multiplayer map that stands out due to its small size, allowing for action-packed matches.

“Shipment” is far from the only map that received a fair share of attention from the community, though. Gamers have already devised some fairly interesting Battlefield 6 maps in Portal mode, ranging from close-quarters arenas to sprawling areas. Among the most popular maps so far, there is "Besieged," for example, which offers a wave-defense horde mode. Fans who wanted to efficiently farm XP from bots have also made "Breakthrough Solo Bots" a popular - if controversial - map.

A fan has also recreated Battlefield 3 ’s Noshahr Canals map in Battlefield 6 . According to the map’s creator, this was a difficult task to pull off, as the assets are still fairly limited in Portal mode, but the final result offers a fairly nostalgic experience.

Gamers can expect Portal mode to become even bigger with time, especially as the developers add more functions to it, and the creators in the community get used to its quirks. Battlefield 6 had a huge launch, with over 700,000 simultaneous Steam players trying it soon after the release. A few days ago, Electronic Arts revealed that Battlefield 6 sold over six million units in the first three days. With these numbers, not only is Battlefield 6 a serious competitor to this year’s Call of Duty , even without gamers copying its maps, but it also has a fairly good chance to be supported by EA for a long time.

22
8.6 /10
9 /10

item.title: How To Build Manekin In Genshin Impact (Best Weapons And Artifacts)
item.description:
The Miliastra Wonderland Manekin is a playable and customizable character in Genshin Impact . You obtain the Manekin by unlocking the Miliastra Wonderland, and it can also be played in the open world. It's an interesting character that can wield all the elements, but has the same movesets on every one of them. Here are the best builds for Manekin in Genshin Impact , including the best artifacts and weapons for each element.

How To Switch Manekin Element In Genshin Impact

To switch the Manekin's element in Genshin Impact , simply switch the Traveler's element by heading to the Statue of the Seven of the element's respective region. Once the protagonist changes its alignment, the Manekin will automatically switch their element as well.

Anemo Manekin Build In Genshin Impact

Anemo Manekin works as a driver for other elements like Hydro, Pyro, and Electro in Genshin Impact . For that, it's good to build them with artifact sets like Viridescent Venerer (VV), which will shred enemies' resistance to those elements. It's good to have both Elemental Mastery and ATK% on Anemo Manekin since their role will be to drive elements and trigger reactions while dealing a lot of Anemo DPS.

Weapons

  1. Mistsplitter Reforged
  2. Haran Geppaku Futsu
  3. Primordial Jade Cutter
  4. Skyward Blade
  5. Lion's Roar
  6. Iron Sting

Artifact Sets

  • 4pc Viridescent Venerer
  • 4pc Desert Pavilion Chronicle

Stats

  • Timepiece: Elemental Mastery or ATK%
  • Goblet: Elemental Mastery or ATK%
  • Circlet: Crit DMG or Crit Rate

Substats

  1. Crit DMG
  2. Crit Rate
  3. ATK%
  4. Elemental Mastery
  5. Energy Recharge

Geo Manekin Build In Genshin Impact

There's not much use for a Geo Manekin since they barely have any useful elemental reaction in Genshin Impact . However, it's worth noting that Uraku Misugiri and the Nighttime Whispers in the Echoing Woods set notably increase the DPS of Geo Manekin, giving them a little value in combat instead of nothing at all.

Weapons

  1. Uraku Misugiri
  2. Summit Shaper
  3. Mistsplitter Reforged
  4. Haran Geppaku Futsu
  5. Primordial Jade Cutter
  6. Skyward Blade
  7. Lion's Roar

Artifact Sets

  • 4pc Nighttime Whispers in the Echoing Woods
  • 4pc Shimenawa's Reminiscence

Stats

  • Timepiece: ATK%
  • Goblet: Geo DMG
  • Circlet: Crit Rate or Crit DMG

Substats

  1. Crit DMG
  2. Crit Rate
  3. ATK%
  4. Energy Recharge

Electro Manekin Build In Genshin Impact

As a cheat code for any Electro character that fails to deal any kind of DPS, Hyperbloom teams are always the answer. Slap as much Elemental Mastery as possible and build Electro Manekin with the Flower of Paradise Lost set to maximize the DMG of their Hyperbloom.

Weapons

  1. Light of Foliar Incision
  2. Freedom-Sworn
  3. Xiphos' Moonlight
  4. Sapwood Blade
  5. Iron Sting

Artifact Sets

  • 4pc Flower of Paradise Lost
  • 4pc Gilded Dreams
  • 4pc Thundering Fury

Stats

  • Timepiece: Elemental Mastery
  • Goblet: Elemental Mastery
  • Circlet: Elemental Mastery or Crit Rate

Substats

  1. Elemental Mastery
  2. Crit Rate
  3. Crit DMG
  4. Energy Recharge

Dendro Manekin Build In Genshin Impact

Dendro Manekin can operate as a driver for Nilou teams since they have a decent Dendro application when they're on the field. The Dendro Cores' DMG scale with Elemental Mastery, so build Dendro Manekin on a lot of that stat in Genshin Impact .

Weapons

  1. Light of Foliar Incision
  2. Freedom-Sworn
  3. Xiphos' Moonlight
  4. Sapwood Blade
  5. Iron Sting

Artifact Sets

  • 4pc Flower of Paradise Lost
  • 4pc Gilded Dreams
  • 4pc Deepwood Memories

Stats

  • Timepiece: Elemental Mastery
  • Goblet: Elemental Mastery
  • Circlet: Elemental Mastery or Crit Rate

Substats

  1. Elemental Mastery
  2. Crit Rate
  3. Crit DMG
  4. Energy Recharge

Hydro Manekin Build In Genshin Impact

Although Hydro is one of the best elements in Genshin Impact , it still fails to save Manekin's DPS. It's better to run Hydro Manekin in Vaporize teams with a full DPS build to make the most of their time on the field. They can also operate as a driver for Ineffa teams in Genshin Impact .

Weapons

  1. Mistsplitter Reforged
  2. Haran Geppaku Futsu
  3. Primordial Jade Cutter
  4. Wolf-Fang
  5. The Black Sword
  6. Skyward Blade
  7. Lion's Roar

Artifact Sets

  • 4pc Heart of Depth
  • 4pc Nymph's Dream

Stats

  • Timepiece: ATK%
  • Goblet: Hydro DMG
  • Circlet: Crit DMG or Crit Rate

Substats

  1. Crit DMG
  2. Crit Rate
  3. ATK%
  4. Energy Recharge
  5. Elemental Mastery

Pyro Manekin Build In Genshin Impact

Same as Electro, it's better to build Manekin with a full Elemental Mastery build to maximize the DMG of their Burgeon. On the other hand, you can also build Pyro Manekin on a full DPS build and depend on their Elemental Burst to deal a one-time high Melt DMG. Not really game-changing, but it's cool.

Weapons

  1. Light of Foliar Incision
  2. Freedom-Sworn
  3. Xiphos' Moonlight
  4. Sapwood Blade
  5. Iron Sting

Artifact Sets

  • 4pc Flower of Paradise Lost
  • 4pc Gilded Dreams
  • 4pc Crimson Witch of Flames

Stats

  • Timepiece: Elemental Mastery
  • Goblet: Elemental Mastery
  • Circlet: Elemental Mastery or Crit Rate

Substats

  1. Elemental Mastery
  2. Crit Rate
  3. Crit DMG
  4. Energy Recharge

item.title: Best Roblox Phonk ID Codes (October 2025)
item.description:
Roblox offers thousands of different experiences, many of which feature unique gameplay and worlds. Despite this, many of them share similar features, such as the ability to play custom tracks through music items. In this guide, we'll tell you about the best Roblox phonk ID codes.

As an underground hip-hop subgenre, phonk has a unique style that can enhance your gaming experience. Fortunately, players can use specific ID codes to play these tracks, though you'll have to fulfill several requirements to unlock this feature.

Updated October 23, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Roblox offers a variety of phonk sound IDs you can use in-game to enhance your audio experience. From energetic tracks like Mad Phonk Energy to darker vibes like Phonk of Darkness, there’s something for every mood. These IDs let you customize your gameplay with unique Phonk beats and intense soundscapes. Keep an eye out for updates, as new sounds may be added to keep your audio setup fresh and exciting.

Best Roblox Phonk ID Codes

Phonk is great for various racing and driving simulators in Roblox . But you can also play it in other experiences, such as RPGs or battlegrounds. Players only need to know the appropriate Roblox phonk ID codes.

All music features in Roblox use ID codes. But there are so many of them that it's almost impossible to listen to them all. So, we've compiled the best Roblox phonk ID codes to save you time. Among them, you're sure to find at least a few tracks to suit your taste.

How to Use Roblox Phonk ID Codes

It's important to note that using phonk ID codes may vary in different Roblox experiences. First of all, the radio or boombox features in games are paid. In other words, before you can play the tracks you want, you'll need to pay Robux for the corresponding game pass. For example, in the Fisch experience, the Radio Gamepass costs 109 Robux.

After spending money, you'll either receive a new item or unlock a new menu option. In either case, players will be able to enter various ID codes and play their favorite tracks while playing Roblox .

item.title: Roblox: Catch and Build a Dinosaur Garden Codes (October 2025)
item.description:
Roblox allows you to play many different games, and Catch and Build a Dinosaur Garden is quite the creative experience. Here, you will be able to capture various dinosaurs and use them to earn cash. Also, you will be able to ride these creatures, and if you want to expand your collection, you will need all the resources available. Fortunately, this game features redeemable codes, and in this guide, we will provide you with the Catch and Build a Dinosaur Garden codes for some free loot.

Updated October 23, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Catch and Build a Dinosaur Garden has added new codes that grant you Potions to boost your progress. These rewards can help you grow your prehistoric garden faster and make your dinosaurs even stronger. The latest update brings fresh opportunities to collect valuable items and improve your setup. Check back soon for more updates and new codes as the game continues to expand.

All Catch and Build a Dinosaur Garden Codes

Working Catch and Build a Dinosaur Garden Codes

  • 22vk79 – Gives you Potion. (NEW)
  • 8s029r – Gives you Potion. (NEW)

Expired Catch and Build a Dinosaur Garden Codes

  • pun3u0
  • ql62e3
  • lllasso
  • lassoooo

In Catch and Build a Dinosaur Garden , you can use guns to shoot dinosaurs and capture them. The creatures that you catch can be placed on your plot and used to earn money. Additionally, you can tame such a creature and make it your mount. In order to do this, you will need to use special consumable items called Lassos, and fortunately, some promo codes allow you to get them for free.

We don’t recommend waiting too long before redeeming codes for this Roblox game. If you don’t activate them in time, they will expire, and your freebies will no longer be available.

How to Redeem Catch and Build a Dinosaur Garden Codes

Promo codes in Catch and Build a Dinosaur Garden can provide you with useful items. Luckily, the redemption process in this game is very simple and only requires you to click a few buttons. Follow these steps to activate Catch and Build a Dinosaur Garden codes:

  • Launch Catch and Build a Dinosaur Garden , and wait for this Roblox experience to load.
  • After that, click on the Code button in the upper right corner of your screen.
  • Enter the code you want to redeem in the menu that pops up.
  • Click on the OK button.
  • The reward is yours.

How to Get New Catch and Build a Dinosaur Garden Codes

The developers of Catch and Build a Dinosaur Garden may add more promo codes in the future, and if this happens, we will update our article. Feel free to bookmark this guide and check it from time to time for new bonuses. Also, you can follow the official Catch and Build a Dinosaur Garden media:

  • Discord Server
  • YouTube Channel
